Body:
n_categories = 1
dsid, lsi_id, _, ds_input = get_features_lsi_cached(app, n_categories=
    n_categories)
method = V01 + '/feature-extraction/{}'.format(dsid)
data = app.get_check(method)
training_set = ds_input['training_set']
pars = {'parent_id': lsi_id, 'data': training_set, 'method': 'NearestNeighbor'}
method = V01 + '/categorization/'
data = app.post_check(method, json=pars)
mid = data['id']
method = V01 + '/categorization/{}/predict'.format(mid)
data = app.get_check(method, json={'batch_id': -1, 'subset_document_id': [
    222784, 5184, 929296, 999999999]})
data = data['data']
assert len(data) == 3
assert_array_equal([row['document_id'] for row in data], [5184, 222784, 929296]
    )
method = V01 + '/categorization/{}'.format(mid)
app.delete_check(method)
